page.title: 03Halesworth Local Government
page.content: The top tier of local government is Suffolk County Council, which controls Education,Police, Fire Service, Highways,Public Transport and Strategic Planning.The County Councillors for this section are Mrs. H. Hall and Mr. R.Niblett. The second tier of local government is Waveney District Council.Most of the section comes under Waveney but a small part in the west comes under Suffolk Coastal.The district councils control housing,recreational amenities,refuse disposal,environmental health,planning and the rating system.The District Councillors are E.Leverett,Labour. R.Niblett and K.Currie Conservative. S.Hall, Suffolk Coastal Conservative. The lowest tier are Parish Councils: Halesworth town council is a Parish Council but has no specific responsibilies.
